Narrative Multiplayer Strategy RPG Enhanced by the Blockchain
and Set in a Collaborative Sci-Fi Universe

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(43,135,218,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”#0b0604″ background_color_gradient_start_position=”70%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”88%” background_image=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/MG-e1637776165499.png” background_size=”contain” transform_translate_linked__hover=”off” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto|-8px|auto||” custom_padding=”475px||60px|||” scroll_horizontal_motion_enable=”off” background_last_edited=”on|desktop” background_size_tablet=”cover” background_size_phone=”cover” global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”105%|105%” background__hover_enabled=”off|hover” background_image__hover=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/MG-3.png” background_enable_image__hover=”on” parallax__hover=”off” background_blend__hover=”normal”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_image=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_class=”trailer” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_video_mp4=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/SteamGif-2.mp4″ width=”20%” width_tablet=”60%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” height=”200px” height_tablet=”200px” height_phone=”200px” height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#110f24″ background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(25,23,41,0.52)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(25,23,41,0.4)” background_image=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/background-highres-1.jpg” background_repeat=”repeat-y” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0b0604″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.07)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|auto|-2px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”76px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”800px” custom_margin=”13px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”7px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” custom_padding=”5px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Join the Ranks of the Angels!

Angelic combines turn-based strategy combat with a narrative RPG, all backed by a collaboratively crafting science-fiction setting thanks to blockchain technology. Get ready to shape a massive conflict in the dark and compelling universe of Angelic.

It will not be an easy journey, and each action will have deep echoing repercussions. But don’t worry, you won’t have to do it alone.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids=”2213″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”17px” box_shadow_blur=”28px” box_shadow_spread=”-6px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(81,81,124,0.61)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”75%” animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”800ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s Build this Universe Together!

Angelic features a collaborative development between the developers and the fans: United, we expand the universe.

Backed by the blockchain, you can create cosmetic items, ships, and even hero NFTs to use or trade them. Thanks to our DAO mechanism, our community will also have significant governance over the game and IP.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids=”2177,2178,2179,2180,2181,2182″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”600px” module_alignment=”center” height=”340px” max_height=”340px” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”250ms” auto=”on” auto_speed=”4000″ box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”17px” box_shadow_blur=”28px” box_shadow_spread=”-6px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(81,81,124,0.61)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”75%” custom_padding=”100px|||||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”800ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yy2FUOq-ero&t=2s&ab_channel=AngelicTheGame” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”600px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_horizontal=”3px” box_shadow_vertical=”-7px” box_shadow_blur=”66px” box_shadow_spread=”-27px” box_shadow_color=”#8392ab” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Survive in an Unforgiving Universe!

You are no longer a human. You have transcended and are now known as Phoenix, a unique neo-human prototype. You were engineered by Iset the Mother herself, who is a goddess and your redeemer, and also your companion.

You will meet other companions on your adventure. These potential allies might have different abilities, agendas, motivations, and desires.

If you can gain their respect and trust, however, you will assemble a fearsome force.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”75%” custom_padding=”100px|||||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”800ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Captain a One-of-a-Kind Mothership

Iset, the very first neo-human ever created and practically the mother of many other angels, entrusts you captaining her own ship: Osiris.

It is your team’s home base. Explore the vast universe of Angelic and expand into it, carefully of course, since the space is full of dangers… However, in order to develop your abilities, create and customize your heroes or craft items; you will need to salvage parts, help colonies or raid corporations’ stations.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids=”2185,2186″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”600px” module_alignment=”center” min_height=”340px” height=”340px” max_height=”340px” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”250ms” auto=”on” auto_speed=”4000″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_horizontal=”-4px” box_shadow_vertical=”-24px” box_shadow_blur=”44px” box_shadow_spread=”-22px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(81,81,124,0.61)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”75%” custom_margin=”|auto|15px|auto||” custom_padding=”100px|||||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”800ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids=”2187,2188,2189,2190,2191″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”600px” module_alignment=”center” min_height=”340px” height=”340px” max_height=”340px” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”250ms” auto=”on” auto_speed=”4000″ box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_horizontal=”20px” box_shadow_vertical=”-39px” box_shadow_blur=”22px” box_shadow_spread=”-30px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(81,81,124,0.61)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Enter the Angelic Metaverse!

Play the base game and enjoy the narrative, join the multiplayer mode, participate in colony wars, forge alliances, fight co-op missions, or optionally create and trade your NFTs and stake Angelverse tokens to gain governance rights. Angelic will also be a multiplatform game, so a massive community will be waiting for you to play and trade.

The options are limitless. It is up to you how to participate and enjoy.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”15px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”31px||0px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Partners

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ excerpt.rendered: Narrative Multiplayer Strategy RPG Enhanced by the Blockchainand Set in a Collaborative Sci-Fi Universe Join the Ranks of the Angels! Angelic combines turn-based strategy combat with a narrative RPG, all backed by a collaboratively crafting science-fiction setting thanks to blockchain technology. Get ready to shape a massive conflict in the dark and compelling universe of Angelic. […]
